title: The Lamentation
medium: traveling altar with a woodcut printed on parchment in black and hand-colored in blue, green, brown, tan, orange, and red; set between two panels of printed text to form a triptych; housed in a slipcase with an embroidered crucifixion scene on the front and backed in leather; in turn housed in a velvet, silk, and linen box, strengthened with layers of parchment from an account book, with ornamental tassels at each corner
dimensions:
sheet: 12.7 x 12.8 cm (5 x 5 1/16 in.)
overall (slipcase and box): 15.6 x 39.5 cm (6 1/8 x 15 9/16 in.)
